name: .TM File Extension
summary: Learn about .TM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a TM file with Google Teachable Machine (Web). To do so, open Teachable Machine in your web browser, select the app's sandwich menu, and click Open project from file. Then, navigate to and open your TM file.
You can also open a TM file as you would any ZIP file, to retrieve the project assets and manifest file it contains. To do so, you may first have to rename the file's extension to .zip.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .tm file in Google Teachable Machine
